description:
We now have one great NBA Game Time app for iPad, iPhone and iPod touch updated with new features for the 2014-15 season. This version of the app will no longer be supported as of October 4, 2014.  To get the latest version for your iPad search for NBA Game Time on the app store.  

By upgrading to the latest version you’ll receive all following features plus access to upgrade to NBA LEAGUE PASS and NBA Game Time Plus for all your devices:

- Watch game recap and team videos  
- Follow live stats, scores, and schedules for every NBA game
- Watch live press conferences and highlights from around the league
- Get team rosters, follow league leaders and get the latest league news
- Set Customized Alerts : Excitement Notifications for big moments, Threshold Notifications to follow your favorite player as they break personal records and Game Alerts so you never miss a moment
- Follow the social buzz with live twitter streams for each game 
- Customize to feature your favorite team

If you have any questions please contact us at: nbagtsupport@turner.com
trackCensoredName: NBA Game Time for iPad - OLD
